verses.verse: אֵלֶּה֩ <S%H428><s%> 'el-Leh These דִבְרֵ֨י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei These [are] the words הַבְּרִ֜ית <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit of the covenant אֲ‍ ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'asher- which צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, Moses לִכְרֹ֛ת <S%H3772><s%> lich-Rot to make אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei with the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av; of Moab מִלְּבַ֣ד <S%H905><s%> mil-le-Vad alone הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit, beside the covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which כָּרַ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> ka-Rat which he made אִתָּ֖ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tam at בְּחֹרֵֽב׃ <S%H2722><s%> be-cho-Rev. with them in Horeb פ Peh

וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El unto all Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem; about אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem You רְאִיתֶ֗ם <S%H7200><s%> re-'i-Tem, unto them Ye have seen אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after עָשָׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah did יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh all that the LORD לְעֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-nei-Chem before your eyes בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לְפַרְעֹ֥ה <S%H6547><s%> le-far-'Oh unto Pharaoh וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-le-chol- and all עֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav and unto all his servants וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-le-chol- and all אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> ar-Tzo. and unto all his land

הַמַּסּוֹת֙ <S%H4531><s%> ham-mas-sOt temptations הַגְּדֹלֹ֔ת <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lot, The great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which רָא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U have seen עֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha; which thine eyes הָאֹתֹ֧ת <S%H226><s%> ha-'o-Tot the signs וְהַמֹּפְתִ֛ים <S%H4159><s%> ve-ham-mo-fe-Tim miracles הַגְּדֹלִ֖ים <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lim and those great הָהֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> ha-Hem. those

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor נָתַן֩ <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan hath not given יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Yet the LORD לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem לֵב֙ <S%H3820><s%> lev you an heart לָדַ֔עַת <S%H3045><s%> la-Da-'at, to perceive וְעֵינַ֥יִם <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Na-yim and eyes לִרְא֖וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot to see וְאָזְנַ֣יִם <S%H241><s%> ve-'a-ze-Na-yim and ears לִשְׁמֹ֑עַ <S%H8085><s%> lish-Mo-a'; to hear עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. to this

וָאוֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> va-'o-Lech have led אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im you forty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not בָל֤וּ <S%H1086><s%> va-Lu are not waxen old שַׂלְמֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H8008><s%> sal-mo-tei-Chem your clothes מֵעֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-lei-Chem, on וְנַֽעַלְךָ֥ <S%H5275><s%> ve-na-'al-Cha upon you and thy shoe לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- has not בָלְתָ֖ה <S%H1086><s%> val-Tah is not waxen old מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al on רַגְלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7272><s%> rag-Le-cha. upon thy foot

לֶ֚חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem bread לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor אֲכַלְתֶּ֔ם <S%H398><s%> 'a-chal-Tem, Ye have not eaten וְיַ֥יִן <S%H3196><s%> ve-Ya-yin wine וְשֵׁכָ֖ר <S%H7941><s%> ve-she-Char or strong drink לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor שְׁתִיתֶ֑ם <S%H8354><s%> she-ti-Tem; neither have ye drunk לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an order תֵּֽדְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> te-de-'U, that ye might know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

וַתָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo-'u And when ye came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom unto this place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze came out סִיחֹ֣ן <S%H5511><s%> si-Chon Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- the king חֶ֠שְׁבּוֹן <S%H2809><s%> Chesh-bon of Heshbon וְע֨וֹג <S%H5747><s%> ve-'og and Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- the king הַבָּשָׁ֧ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan of Bashan לִקְרָאתֵ֛נוּ <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-Te-nu against לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah us unto battle וַנַּכֵּֽם׃ <S%H5221><s%> van-nak-Kem. and we smote

וַנִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> van-nik-Kach And we took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַרְצָ֔ם <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tzam, their land וַנִּתְּנָ֣הּ <S%H5414><s%> van-nit-te-Nah and gave לְנַחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> le-na-cha-Lah, it for an inheritance לָרֽאוּבֵנִ֖י <S%H7206><s%> lo-r-'u-ve-Ni unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֑י <S%H1425><s%> ve-lag-ga-Di; and to the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> ve-la-cha-Tzi and to the half שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet tribe הַֽמְנַשִּֽׁי׃ <S%H4520><s%> Ham-nash-Shi. of Manasseh

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֗ם <S%H8104><s%> u-she-mar-Tem, Keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei therefore the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit of this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, likewise וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-si-Tem and do אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam; לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an that תַּשְׂכִּ֔ילוּ <S%H7919><s%> tas-Ki-lu, them that ye may prosper אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you תַּעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Sun. in all that ye do פ Peh

אַתֶּ֨ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem You נִצָּבִ֤ים <S%H5324><s%> nitz-tza-Vim Ye stand הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> hai-yOm this day כֻּלְּכֶ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-le-Chem, all לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei all of you before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God רָאשֵׁיכֶ֣ם <S%H7218><s%> ra-shei-Chem your captains שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H7626><s%> shiv-tei-Chem, of your tribes זִקְנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H2205><s%> zik-nei-Chem your elders וְשֹׁ֣טְרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H7860><s%> ve-Sho-te-rei-Chem, and your officers כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish [with] all the men יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

טַפְּכֶ֣ם <S%H2945><s%> tap-pe-Chem Your little ones נְשֵׁיכֶ֔ם <S%H802><s%> ne-shei-Chem, your wives וְגֵ֣רְךָ֔ <S%H1616><s%> ve-Ge-re-cha, and thy stranger אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev that [is] in מַחֲנֶ֑יךָ <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Nei-cha; thy camp מֵחֹטֵ֣ב <S%H2404><s%> me-cho-Tev from the hewer עֵצֶ֔יךָ <S%H6086><s%> 'e-Tzei-cha, of thy wood עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad who שֹׁאֵ֥ב <S%H7579><s%> sho-'Ev unto the drawer מֵימֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4325><s%> mei-Mei-cha. of thy water

לְעָבְרְךָ֗ <S%H5674><s%> le-'a-ve-re-Cha, That thou shouldest enter בִּבְרִ֛ית <S%H1285><s%> biv-Rit into covenant יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh with the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God וּבְאָלָת֑וֹ <S%H423><s%> u-ve-'a-la-To; and into his oath אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God כֹּרֵ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> ko-Ret maketh עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-me-Cha you הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. with thee this day

לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an order הָקִֽים־ <S%H6965><s%> ha-kim- That he may establish אֹתְךָ֩ <S%H853><s%> 'o-te-Cha הַיּ֨וֹם׀ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom thee to day ל֜וֹ lo לְעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> le-'Am, for a people וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become לְּךָ֙ le-Cha לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him, unto himself and [that] he may be unto thee a God כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> dib-ber- as he hath said לָ֑ךְ Lach; וְכַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ve-cha-'a-Sher to you נִשְׁבַּע֙ <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' unto thee and as he hath sworn לַאֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha, unto thy fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> le-yitz-Chak to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> u-le-ya-'a-ko. and to Jacob

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem for לְבַדְּכֶ֑ם <S%H905><s%> le-vad-de-Chem; alone אָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi, I כֹּרֵת֙ <S%H3772><s%> ko-Ret Neither with you only do I make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, likewise וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאָלָ֖ה <S%H423><s%> ha-'a-Lah and this oath הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot. likewise

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יֶשְׁנ֜וֹ <S%H3426><s%> yesh-No here with us this פֹּ֗ה <S%H6311><s%> Poh, here עִמָּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu with עֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Med But with [him] that standeth הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, day לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; our God וְאֵ֨ת <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et for אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אֵינֶ֛נּוּ <S%H369><s%> 'ei-Nen-nu else פֹּ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> poh here עִמָּ֥נוּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu with הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. and also with [him] that [is] not here with us this day

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you יְדַעְתֶּ֔ם <S%H3045><s%> ye-da'-Tem, (For ye know אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- how יָשַׁ֖בְנוּ <S%H3427><s%> ya-Shav-nu how we have dwelt בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וְאֵ֧ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- and how עָבַ֛רְנוּ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Var-nu and how we came בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev through הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עֲבַרְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-var-Tem. which ye passed by
